amendment.description: To impose an economic sanction on foreign countries that owe parking fines and penalties or property taxes to Washington, D.C. or New York City.

vote.text: Amendment SA 280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 280 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S3185; text: CR S3185) To impose an economic sanction on foreign countries that owe parking fines and penalties or property taxes to Washington, D.C. or New York City.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 280 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Schumer.
